website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 II compact camera offers a few worthwhile upgrades when compared with the original RX100, but comes in at a higher asking price.
cons: Could be sharper at the edges of the frame at 28mm

customer_reviews.title: A great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: We're so pleased with the camera - it does evrything we need and more. The different modes are brilliant for when you can't be bothered to think about what you're doing but it's also nice to be able to control the shutter speed and aperture for when you want to get creative. It's a really small size so great for hoidays. Most importantly, the picture quality is excellent. It does take a bit of getting used to - the shutter feels like it's in the wrong place and the pop up flash is a bit awkward, but after a few days it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera as alternative to DLSR.
customer_reviews.text: There are many reviews about this camera I like the 100mm end would prefer 24 at the other end though. It takes very good pictures but is reasonably complicated to use as options available vary according to mode. I generally use this when travelling or events as it fits in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: eenus

customer_reviews.title: fabulous camera and extremely well made. you may have ...
customer_reviews.text: fabulous camera and extremely well made.you may have to be an enthusiast to make the most of all its many features,but just as impressive as a top class point and shoot,if you want a long zoom go elsewhere,other than that it cannot be bettered in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Sue R.

customer_reviews.title: great little camera in terms of image quality
customer_reviews.text: great little camera in terms of image quality. But disappointed with the AF and usability. I have a Ricoh GR and the Sony interface is a mess in comparison and the AF is not as reliable as my partners canon p&s.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert Norbertson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for an amateur photographer who wants good quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Cervenka

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous pro-quality compact
customer_reviews.text: the results this wee camera can produce are simply stunning, I wanted a small , take anywhere camera that still produced quality. My usual beast is a leica M9 / summicron glass and this comes pretty close (when shooting raw) The zeiss lens excells and the big sensor ensures quality output. It really is tiny and definately shirt-pocketable dont dither, just buy it...I guarantee you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Private Doc.

customer_reviews.title: Way beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.text: In all the years that I have been a photographer I have never managed to find a true compact that delivered a result useful for anything but personal use. The Sony though is a revelation. A little fiddly to use but the results are extraordinary and bear comparison to many DSLR's. It is also a camera that does not call attention to itself and slips easily into a pocket. It's feel is of a very robust, beautifully finished machine and reassuringly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Medium Nib

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Compact Camera
customer_reviews.text: I cannot big this camera up enough. So simple to use and produces fantastic photos. Sharp and effective zoom lens but still small enough to fit in your pocket. Good range of features. Big, clear viewing screen at the back. Particularly good with capturing light making it great for any range but we loved the landscape shots that it took. Feels like a very good quality item and well worth the price. Highly recommended :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L

customer_reviews.title: best pocket cam so far rx100mk3 not worth the exstra cash
customer_reviews.text: Great cam IQ un matched for a pocket cam, RAW gets the best IQ out of your pics well worth it, i wont ramble on but upload some pics ive taken they speak for them self.
customer_reviews.author: Englishelite

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best on the price/value curve for the RX100 models
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. Good price (this had a Sony rebate on it and I'm sure it will be down to the reasonable level when the M4 arrives). Great image quality (sparkles compared to a small sensor camera) and the bounce flash is inspired. Not as small as I thought it should be but its fine as a jacket pocket camera.
customer_reviews.author: isvana

customer_reviews.title: Complex but Good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, if a bit complicated for the beginner. Quality of photos is excellent once you have learned how to use it. Can't give a really fair review as I'm still learning. However, an experienced friend who originally showed me this camera reproduces photos of first class quality which is why I purchased this particular one.
customer_reviews.author: Gave

customer_reviews.title: Great colour and sharpness in a compact digital camera.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent compact digital camera; photographs are true to colour and sharp (providing they are taken properly of course). Easy to carry; a camera you can always have on you.
customer_reviews.author: Free Spirit

customer_reviews.title: not too bad but it's small enough for general use
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera, just not so sure about the colour. The back screen can easily get scratched as it was meant to be kept in jean pockets. Sometimes the focus seems to be a bit slow and panoramic shot requires a slow movement. Overall it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Chakrit Ratanamook

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera. Really quick shutter speed catches the kids superbly. Quality is superb and I have had much more expensive cameras in tge past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Still haven't figured out how to put it to best use but will give it more time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. Please watch the cashback deal though. I submitted my cashback form in July 2014. I am still awaiting payment. I have contacted Sony UK who just transfer me to "customer service" in France who do nothing. I have bought Sony for over 30 years but the way they have handled my cashback has destroyed my trust in the business.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Better than my Cannon SLR in a lot of ways. Very easy to use, each mode explains itself on screen. Very easy to transfer photos to the computer, iPhone or iPad wirelessly. Not to mention it takes very good photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Hirons

customer_reviews.title: The best compact I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Im a pro cameraman and I have to say Im very impressed by this little camera. Picture quality is good and as is the range of features. My only minor gripe is that accessing the features can be a bit tricky with big hands - but then this is a compact!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Camera great apart from one bug
customer_reviews.text: Camera great apart from one bug, in which the focus causes the camera to go in a "buzz frenzy"; according to frequent case descriptions found in different forums a common bug with this model, which let's the overall great quality (build, software, optics) quite down. Will have to exchange now.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little camera! Finding it more difficult than my SLR but will get there. So light and portable too.
customer_reviews.author: Suky

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: As usual a camera relies on a piece of glass for it's reason of being. This camera with a Carl Zeiss lens is wonderful, a joy to see the results of its pin sharp quality. Have not had this Sony that long to discover all he various functions quietly waiting in the menu. A deceptively small camera with a big heart! Very happy with it. Delivery was perfect, after a slight mix up at the beginning that was sorted very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J Hurr

customer_reviews.title: A great camera, with hundreds of option, but...
customer_reviews.text: A great camera, with hundreds of options, but as usual dreadful instructions or how to find and how to use them. I downloaded other instructions and final purchased a book on how to use the camera. The book however assumes some prior knowledge of the camera and is useful but not great. I think it will take a long time to make use of a fantastic device, that is beautifully made and great to handle. If you use just the auto point and click you are missing so much nut that enables you to use it out of the box..
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera no problems at all so many functions..video is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. G. Brain

customer_reviews.title: 1080p24 only in NTSC mode
customer_reviews.text: Whilst this camera gets great reviews I specifically brought this version over the mark 1 for it's extra ability to film 1080p at 24 fps, a video mode that is bluray compliant. However, what all the reviews fail to mention is that this mode is not available when the camera is in PAL mode. Only when the camera is in NTSC mode does it become an option. Leaving the camera in this mode would be fine except that everytime you switch it on it reminds you that you're using a PAL camera in NTSC mode. Very annoying!
customer_reviews.author: DougD

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my husband who is a complete camera nut. Arrived well before expected and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthielicious

customer_reviews.title: Sony big law good! Just cannot imagine a digital camera can work ...
customer_reviews.text: Sony big law good! Just cannot imagine a digital camera can work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Pan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's so compact and takes amazing pictures even in poorly lit places. I'm so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ketty Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Sony & Carl Zeiss!
customer_reviews.text: Since owning this camera, since the week of its launch, and reaching fairway up the Learning Curve, (IMO) I notice at least 200% improvement in the quality of images I capture, requiring bare minimum post processing, if any, to meet MY approval. Update, 13.08.13. - Further experience with this camera convinces me that despite some very minor personal incompatibilities, this Compact and its Output is hard to flaw. Update, 26.08.13. - Have added compatible EVF (EV1MK) to the camera, review on appropriate site.
customer_reviews.author: Sam-Theo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product - for a compact camera it's fantastic Great quality and versatility I use it with a Recsea camera housing for diving photos
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre/Keith Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Useless in high humidity-Very poor support from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this camera if you will be using it in a high humidity environment. With this camera 3 months old the menus became un-useable, cycling through all selections but not allowing any selections to be made. On returning it to Sony I was told it was due to water damage, the camera was beyond economic repair, it was not covered by the warranty and they charged me £34 for examining it!!! The camera had been used during skiing trips and had been in my jacket pocket in high humidity but had never been in direct contact with water, and as such I would regard this as unfit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: J Weston

customer_reviews.title: Great images let down by poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The images these cameras produce are wonderful, there is no question about that, and you have to admire the design and engineering getting it all into such a small and compact package. My first one had a fault with the LCD out of the box, it's replacement lasted 28 days before the focus motor developed a fault, a real shame but credit to Amazon they were first class in sorting out the return and refunds of the cameras. I am not brave enough to chance a third, which is a shame as the images are great.
customer_reviews.author: martyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality images but died when it got wet
customer_reviews.text: Good quality images but died when it got wet, so beware, may be a little frail. Luckily the insurance paid out and I'm trying again...
customer_reviews.author: Pete Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera - shameful service from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Where is my cashback? - 10 weeks and waiting. The camera is superb. Sony's service is below appalling. The £50 cash back was a big component of my decision to buy. 28 days to deliver the cash was Sony's promise. Now it's 10 weeks and no sign of the money. There is no way to contact Sony directly, only through an agent who knows nothing. Negative feedback on the Sony Website is banned - anything less than stupendous praise is rejected as "non-compliant". BEWARE!!! Update Like many other unfortunate buyers waiting for cashbck, mine did eventually arrive. Camera 5 stars - fully merits all the hype for image quality and ease of use. Sony - 0 satrs
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: It's more hassle than it's worth as their customer service is terrible. If I realised how bad their customer service ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in camera in August. Sony have still not processed the cashback nearly 6 months later. It's more hassle than it's worth as their customer service is terrible. If I realised how bad their customer service was I would never have bought a sony product. The camera is ok but is overpriced and the software is not very user friendly. lots of glitches etc... i'll certainly not be buying a sony product again in future.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Camera did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because of the glowing reviews it had received. To my dismay, the item was received poorly packaged. The battery was flat. There was no charging cable. Until now, the camera has not worked. I had to go on ebay and buy another one which I'm currently using. I lodged a complaint, to no avail. Amazon did not even bother to adjudicate my dispute. The purchase of £450 plus postage left a bitter taste in the mouth. My advice to prospective buyers is....TO BUY A NEW MODEL!!!
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH SEECHARRAN
